prompts: Create a butterfly Pokemon with vibrant colors and unique wing patterns.
I want a bug-type Pokemon that has a majestic appearance and beautiful wings.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a butterfly and has a colorful, decorative style.
Make a flying-type Pokemon that features intricate designs and bright colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that flutters gracefully through gardens and fields.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the elegance of a butterfly with striking colors.
Show me a Pokemon that has a whimsical and colorful butterfly-like design.
